name: Bulls-eye
description:
In Bulls-eye you are an eye in a dungeon that can shoot! Enemys spawn in waves and tries to track down and kill you. Its your job not to die.

This game was made for the game jam "Simple game jam 4" hosted by Muffan. The theme was "A lot of PEW-PEW"

The game is not that good, it has a lot of bugs and its like my first "real" game i have created. I was running short on time so some parts are a bit rushed.
